A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My review of this movie would be much different had Rian Johnson not directed this film. My biggest problem with this movie\, aside from the plot being all over the place\, is the sheer amount of useless content that does not change the outcome of the story. This is the longest Star Wars movie yet and at least 30 minutes of it is just useless content that does not change a thing. I'm sure if JJ Abrams directed this one like The Force Awakens\, it'd have gone much better.
